<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bracers of Missile Deflection](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3061)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 286 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn bracers

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These bracers are made from plates of durable dawnsilver and gleam like the summer sun. 

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** A ranged weapon attack hits you but doesn't critically hit; **Requirements** You are aware of the attack and not off-guard; **Effect** The bracers send the missile off-course. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If this would cause the attack to be a failure, the attack misses you.
